doctor.name: Dr. Saleque Masud
doctor.specialty: Chest Diseases (Asthma, Allergy, TB) & Medicine Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Saleque Masud is a Medicine Specialist in Kushtia. His qualification is MBBS, DTCD, MD (MEDICINE). He is a Associate Professor, Medicine at Kushtia Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Sono Diagnostic Center, Kushtia. Practicing hour of Dr. Saleque Masud at Sono Diagnostic Center, Kushtia is 11am to 1pm & 4pm to 7pm (Closed: Sat & Friday).

chamber.address: Sono Tower, College Mor, Court Para, Kushtia

doctor.name: Dr. Rashedul Hasan Ripon
doctor.specialty: Chest Diseases (Asthma, Allergy, Pneumonia, TB) & Respiratory Medicine Specialist
doctor.workplace: National Institute of Diseases of the Chest & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Rashedul Hasan Ripon is a Chest Specialist in Kushtia. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Chest Diseases). He is a Consultant, Respiratory Medicine at National Institute of Diseases of the Chest & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Centre, Kushtia. Practicing hour of Dr. Rashedul Hasan Ripon at Popular Diagnostic Centre, Kushtia is 2pm to 9pm (Only Thursday).

chamber.address: City Tower, House # 01, Mir Mosharraf Hossain Road, Coart Para, Kushtia
